quickAccess.title: Quick Access
quickAccess.description: Quickly navigate to any part of the application.

consent.title: Responsible Usage Policy
consent.description: Welcome to K6 Commander. This tool is for testing applications you own or have explicit, written permission to test. Unauthorized load testing of third-party systems is prohibited. By clicking 'I Agree,' you acknowledge you will use this service responsibly and in accordance with our Terms of Service.

form.title: New Test Run
form.description: Configure the parameters for your k6 load test, Lighthouse audit, and AI SEO analysis.
form.urlDescription: The full URL of the endpoint or page you want to test.
form.testSuitesDescription: Select one or more test suites to run against the target URL.
form.k6SwitchDescription: Simulate traffic to analyze performance under load.
form.lighthouseSwitchDescription: Audit for performance, accessibility, and SEO.
form.seoSwitchDescription: Use AI to analyze on-page SEO factors.
form.requestConfigDescription: Define the HTTP request details for the load test.
form.loadProfileDescription: Choose a preset or define a custom load profile for the k6 test.
form.customProfileDescription: Set your own VUs, duration, and stages.
form.stagesDescription: Define the ramp-up/down stages for the VUs.

clearHistoryDialog.title: Clear History?
clearHistoryDialog.description: Starting a new test run with a different URL will clear your previous test history. Would you like to proceed?

error.atLeastOne: At least one test suite must be selected.

toast.historyClearedDescription: Your test history has been successfully cleared.
toast.testStartedDescription: Your test has been initiated. Results will be available soon.

descriptions.custom: Define your own VUs and stages.

running.title: Test Running...
running.description: Please wait a moment while the tests complete. This may take several minutes.

history.title: Test History
history.description: Browse, load, and manage your past test runs.

clearAllDialog.title: Are you sure?
clearAllDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your entire test history.

history.noHistoryDescription: Run a test to begin building your history.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this test run.

toast.exportSuccessDescription: Your test history has been exported as a JSON file.
toast.exportFailDescription: Could not export the test history.
toast.importSuccessDescription: Your test history has been imported.
toast.importFailDescription: Could not import the provided file.
toast.deleteSuccessDescription: The test run has been removed from your history.
toast.clearSuccessDescription: Your entire test history has been deleted.

apiTester.newCollectionDescription: Create a new collection to organize your API requests.

deleteCollectionDialog.title: Delete Collection?
deleteCollectionDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the '{{name}}' collection and all requests within it? This action cannot be undone.

apiTester.noRequestsDescription: Send a request to see it here.

deleteRequestDialog.title: Delete Request?
deleteRequestDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this request from your history?

toast.cannotDeleteDefault: The default 'Scratch Pad' collection cannot be deleted.
toast.curlImportErrorDescription: Please paste a valid cURL command.
toast.jsonFormatErrorDescription: The body could not be formatted as JSON.
toast.curlCopyInvalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL before copying.
toast.curlCopyErrorDescription: Could not copy the request as a cURL command.

importCurlDialog.title: Import from cURL
importCurlDialog.description: Paste a cURL command to automatically populate the request configuration.

apiTester.beautifyJsonTooltip: Format the JSON in the body
apiTester.noResponseYetDesc: Send a request to get a response.

about.title: About K6 Commander
about.description: A local-first, authorized load-testing and API development platform. Configure, run, and analyze load tests, Lighthouse audits, and SEO checks—all from a sleek web UI.
about.localFirstDescription: Your data is yours. All configurations and results are stored securely in your browser's LocalStorage, never leaving your machine.
about.unifiedToolingDescription: We integrate industry-leading open-source tools (k6, Lighthouse) into a single, coherent interface to streamline your testing workflow.
about.k6FeatureDescription: Analyze your application's performance under load.
about.k6HowItWorks: When you start a load test, the backend generates a k6 configuration based on your input and spins up a Docker container using the `grafana/k6` image. k6 sends metrics to a local InfluxDB instance, which is visualized by a pre-configured Grafana instance for real-time dashboards.
about.k6HowItWorks2: At the end of the test, a summary report is saved as a JSON file and displayed in the UI.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks: Running a Lighthouse audit spawns a system process on the backend server, executing `npx lighthouse` against the target URL.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks2: The command outputs reports in both HTML and JSON formats. The JSON summary is sent back to the frontend for visualizing scores, and the full HTML report is linked for detailed analysis.
about.seoHowItWorks: This feature fetches the HTML content of the target URL and sends it to the Google AI API via a Genkit flow.
about.seoHowItWorks2: The AI analyzes critical SEO elements (titles, meta tags, canonicals, etc.) and returns a structured analysis with actionable recommendations for any weaknesses found.
about.apiTesterFeatureDescription: A full-featured client for testing your APIs.
about.apiTesterHowItWorks: The API Tester is a frontend-only tool. It uses the browser's `fetch` API to make requests directly to the endpoint you specify. All requests and responses are handled locally.
about.apiTesterHowItWorks2: Request history, like the rest of the application's data, is stored in your browser's LocalStorage, allowing you to easily revisit and replay past requests.
about.stackDescription: This project is built with a modern, powerful suite of tools.
about.involvedDescription: K6 Commander is open-source. Contributions are welcome!
